lead_paragraph: DEHANEY--Lauretta Virginia Smallwood, retired nurse, died peacefully at the age of 100 on January 11, 2016 in Bronx, NY. Beloved wife of the late Hilton DeHaney, she leaves to mourn a host of relatives and devoted friends. On Saturday, January 23rd, the family will receive friends at Christ Church (Episcopal) Riverdale prior to the service at 11am. An additional Memorial Service will be held on February 6, 2016 at St. Columba's Episcopal Church (Washington, DC) followed by the interment. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DEHANEY, LAURETTA VIRGINIA SMALLWOOD
